promotion.heading: Manuscript Submission Sweepstakes!
promotion.desc:
Enter for a chance to have your manuscript analyzed by Jodie Archer and Matthew Jockers, authors of The Bestseller Code!

So youâ€™ve been writing your novel, investing blood, sweat, and tears into what you hope will take the market by storm. But have you got it right? Will your readers keep turning pages?

In The Bestseller Code, ex-publisher Jodie Archer and digital humanities professor Matthew Jockers explain why some books sell millions of copies. Why do we read what we read? Why do some books seem to capture the whole world? What is the latent DNA common to most of them? This book mixes groundbreaking text mining research and a deep love of contemporary novels to answer all these questions with engaging voice and fresh opinion. It will give you a new perspective on the New York Times bestseller list, and how you might hit it.

"When a story captures the imagination of millions, that's magic. Can you qualify magic? Archer and Jockers just may have done so."
- SYLVIA DAY, New York Times bestselling author


One writer will be given the opportunity to receive detailed human analysis directly from these experts on his or her latest unpublished manuscript.
